entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
